# Hello World

## Config

separation: 6

## Actors

A: Alice
B: Bob
C: Carol

## Flows

### A sends B

hello

### B sends C

world

### C sends A

let's show text in math: $ K_receiver $ !

### A computes 

B says hello

### A and B exchange messages about (delay=1, color=red)

keep talking

### Then B computes

A gets hello

### B thinks

listen!

### C computes
 
C says hello 

### C and B exchange messages about (delay=1, color=blue)

keep talking

### Then B computes

B gets hello
